data.actual_result: You cannot preview the Group DM icons. You have to save it to see the new icon.
data.expected_result: Once you select the new picture for your icon, you should be able to preview the new icon (profile pictures and server icons lets you preview before saving).
data.short_description: Group DM icon doesn't preview in the icon slot when you are changing icons.
data.steps_to_repro: - In a Group DM, go to Group DM settings, and attempt to change the Group DM icon. - Once you select the picture you want to change to, notice the DM icon slot.
